Metrix++

Management of source code quality is possible

Get Started

Configurable

Define and apply your rules and policies. Integrate with your workflow.

Extendable via plugins

Define your custom metric. Add new language parser. Create advanced post-analysis tool.

Multiple metrics

Complexity, size and other.

Multiple languages

C/C++, C# and Java. Recognizes classes, interfaces, namespaces, functions, comments, preprocessor and much more.

High performance and scalability

Applicable to huge code bases: thousands of files per minute. Ultra-fast feedback on iterative re-run.

Effortless application to legacy code

Recognises legacy, modified and new code. Prevents from negative trends. Encourages positive.
